title: Prototype milestone: vertical slice
description: Drafted docs/vertical-slice.md with must-haves and acceptance criteria.

title: Input automation: deterministic replay
description: Design deterministic input sequences for smoke tests (movement, jump, collision).

title: Implement HUD + title/pause screens
description: Added title/pause state handling, HUD DOM updates, and UI overlays in index.html/styles.css with input hooks.

title: Add basic audio playback
description: Implement Web Audio for SFX and a music loop.

title: Add placeholder art + sprite loading
description: Added asset loader, placeholder sprite sheet (assets/sprites.svg + sprites.json), and sprite rendering hooks.

title: Gameplay core: movement/physics spec
description: Drafted docs/physics.md with movement, jump timing, collision, and camera targets.

title: Audio direction: SFX + music plan
description: Drafted docs/audio.md with music/SFX plan and style notes.

title: Epic: QA automation pipeline
description: Coordinate Playwright harness, screenshot baselines, and deterministic input automation.

title: Implement core engine scaffold
description: Implemented core HTML5 scaffold: index.html, styles.css, src/main.js, and core loop/renderer/input modules.

title: Sprite sheet production plan
description: Drafted docs/sprite-sheet.md with sprites, sizes, and export notes.

title: Testing strategy: Playwright harness
description: Added Playwright harness (package.json, playwright.config.js), local test server scripts/serve.js, and basic smoke test in tests/engine.spec.js.

title: Visual regression: screenshot baselines
description: Added Playwright visual regression test with paused canvas screenshot baseline.

title: Project kickoff: define vision/scope for Super Mo
description: Created docs/vision.md with high-level vision, pillars, scope, and success criteria.

title: Collectibles + progression design
description: Drafted docs/collectibles.md with coin rules, rare collectible, and progression.

title: Implement player movement + physics
description: Implemented player movement physics with coyote time, jump buffer, and short hop in src/game/player.js; wired into src/main.js.

title: Implement enemy Moomba
description: Implemented Moomba enemy movement and stomp interaction; added enemy rendering and collision handling.

title: UI/UX: HUD + menus
description: Drafted docs/ui-ux.md with screens, HUD layout, and typography notes.

title: Art direction: visual style + palette
description: Drafted docs/art-direction.md with style, palette, tile specs, character notes, and animation targets.

title: Implement level 1 layout + collisions
description: Implemented level 1 tilemap in src/game/level.js and added tile collision handling in src/game/player.js; renderer now draws tiles.

title: Level design pillars + first level outline
description: Drafted docs/level-design.md with pillars and Level 1 outline.

title: Tech architecture: HTML5 game loop + rendering
description: Drafted docs/architecture.md with core technical decisions, loop, rendering, and directory layout.

title: Enemy roster + behaviors
description: Drafted docs/enemies.md with 3 enemy archetypes and behaviors.
